serengil/deepface

face recognition and analysis in python

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • 2D and 3D face analysis toolbox with recognition, detection, and face swapping
  • Python tools for loading and processing datasets for machine learning
  • Detects and recognizes faces in real time
  • Face recognition SDK for Windows and Linux
  • Pure Go face detection library
  • Detects facial emotions via webcam and stores analytics locally
  • deepfake face swapping toolkit for videos
  • Unified API for face analysis and deepfake detection
  • open-source face recognition REST API with docker support
